histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.ApplyDecision
histogram.summary: The decision made for whether the optimization type can be applied on the page load.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.ApplyDecisionAsync
histogram.summary: Records the decision made for whether the optimization type can be applied on a page load when all information for that page load has been sufficiently gathered. This will be recorded once per callback registered, so if two callbacks were registered for the same optimization type and page load, this will be recorded twice for that case.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.ClearFetchedHints.StoreAvailable
histogram.summary: Records whether the optimization guide store was available when fetched hints are cleared from the store after browser history is cleared.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.ClearHostModelFeatures.StoreAvailable
histogram.summary: Records whether the optimization guide store was available when host model features are cleared from the store after browser history is cleared.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintCache.HintType.Loaded
histogram.summary: Records the store entry type of a hint when it is loaded from the hint cache store.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintCacheLevelDBStore.LoadMetadataResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of loading the metadata while initializing the HintCacheLevelDBStore.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintCacheLevelDBStore.Status
histogram.summary: Records each status change within the HintCacheLevelDBStore.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.GetHintsRequest.ActiveRequestCanceled
histogram.summary: Records when an in-flight hints request was canceled before it finished.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.GetHintsRequest.FetchLatency
histogram.summary: The duration of a request to fetch hints from the remote Optimization Guide Service starts until it completes. Recorded every time hints are fetched and parsed successfully.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.GetHintsRequest.HintCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of hints received from the remote Optimization Guide Service for every successful HintsFetch request.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.GetHintsRequest.HostCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of hosts selected for sending a hint request. This will be captured when any hint request is initiated.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.GetHintsRequest.NetErrorCode
histogram.summary: Net error codes for HintsFetch requests to the Optimization Guide Service on success and failure.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.GetHintsRequest.Status
histogram.summary: For each HintsFetch request to the Optimization Guide Service, log the HTTP response code on success and failure.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.GetHintsRequest.UrlCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of URLs selected for sending a hint request. This will be captured when any hint request is initiated.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.RequestStatus.BatchUpdate
histogram.summary: The status of making a Batch Update context request of the OptmizationGuide HintsFetcher. This includes whether a network request was actually sent or not.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.RequestStatus.PageNavigation
histogram.summary: The status of making a Page Navigation context request of the OptmizationGuide HintsFetcher. This includes whether a network request was actually sent or not.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.TopHostProvider.BlacklistSize.OnInitialize
histogram.summary: Records the number of hosts placed on the HintsFetcherTopHostBlacklist when it is initialized.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.TopHostProvider.BlacklistSize.OnRequest
histogram.summary: Records the number of hosts on the HintsFetcherTopHostBlacklist when top hosts are requested.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.TopHostProvider.BlocklistSize.OnInitialize
histogram.summary: Records the number of hosts placed on the HintsFetcherTopHostBlocklist when it is initialized.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsFetcher.TopHostProvider.BlocklistSize.OnRequest
histogram.summary: Records the number of hosts on the HintsFetcherTopHostBlocklist when top hosts are requested.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsManager.ConcurrentPageNavigationFetches
histogram.summary: The number of active hints fetches initiated by the hints manager. Recorded when a fetch is initiated to the remote Optimization Guide Service at navigation start.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.HintsManager.RaceNavigationFetchAttemptStatus
histogram.summary: Status of a fetch attempt being raced against the current navigation start and whether it includes hosts and urls. Recorded on navigation start (including client redirects) by the hints manager.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.IsPredictionModelValid
histogram.summary: Records whether the prediction model being constructed for an optimization target is valid or not. Recorded when prediction models are loaded into memory by the prediction manager.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.OptimizationFilterStatus
histogram.summary: Status of processing OptimizationFilter configurations for server-provided blacklists. Recorded when the OptimizationGuideService receives a notification to process hints.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.OptimizationHintsComponent.MajorVersion
histogram.summary: Records the major version of the Optimization Hints component that was pushed to the client. This will be recorded at startup and when a new component is received.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionManager.DownloadServiceAvailabilityBlockedFetch
histogram.summary: Records whether the Download Service was unavailable and blocked a fetch that would have happened otherwise. Only recorded if model downloads are enabled for the session.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionManager.HasHostModelFeaturesForHost
histogram.summary: Whether the PredictionManager had HostModelFeatures for the host of the navigation. Recorded when ShouldTargetNavigation is called.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionManager.HostModelFeaturesMapSize
histogram.summary: Records the number of host model features loaded into the map used by the PredictionManager. This is recorded when the host model features are loaded from the store.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionManager.IsDownloadUrlValid
histogram.summary: Records whether the download URL received from the remote Optimization Guide server is valid.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionManager.ModelTypeChanged
histogram.summary: Records whether the model type changed from model proto to model file, or vice versa when the in-memory model for an optimization target has been loaded.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelDownloadManager.DownloadSucceeded
histogram.summary: Records whether the Download Service notified whether a model download has succeeded or failed.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelDownloadManager.DownloadVerificationStatus
histogram.summary: The status of verifying and processing model downloads. Recorded once per file that was successfully downloaded via the Download Service.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelEvaluationLatency
histogram.summary: The duration of evaluating a prediction model for a registered optimization target. Recorded every time a prediction model is successfuly evaluated by the prediction manager. Not recorded if a cached decision is used or if the evaluation fails.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelExpired
histogram.summary: Records whether a prediction model expired if it was not updated or used within the last 30 days by default, but can change subject to Finch configuration.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelFetcher.GetModelsRequest.HostCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of hosts included in a remote Optimization Guide Service client model request. This will be captured when any GetModelsRequest is initiated.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelFetcher.GetModelsResponse.HostModelFeatureCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of host model features received from the remote Optimization Guide Service for every successful GetModelsRequest.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelFetcher.GetModelsResponse.NetErrorCode
histogram.summary: Net error codes for GetModelsRequest to the Optimization Guide Service on success and failure.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelFetcher.GetModelsResponse.Status
histogram.summary: For each GetModelsRequest to the Optimization Guide Service, log the HTTP response code on success and failure.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelLoadedVersion
histogram.summary: Records the version of the prediction model that was loaded from the store and used until updated by a fetch. Recorded only if the loaded model was valid.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelStore.HostModelFeaturesLoadMetadataResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of loading the host model features metadata while initializing the OptimizationGuideStore.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelUpdateVersion
histogram.summary: Records the version of the prediction model that was fetched as an update. Recorded only if a model returned was valid and is available for use.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.PredictionModelValidationLatency
histogram.summary: Records the duration of construction and validation of a prediction model when the prediction manager loads it into memory for a given optimization target. Recorded only if the model is valid and successfully loaded into memory for use.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.ProcessHintsResult
histogram.summary: Whether processing the hints succeeded or failed at a particular step. Recorded when the OptimizationGuideService receives a notification to process hints.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.RemoteFetchingEnabled
histogram.summary: Whether the session is enabled for fetching information from the remote Optimization Guide Service. Recorded when the profile is initialized for the session if Optimization Hints are enabled and the profile is a non-incognito profile.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.ShouldTargetNavigation.PredictionModelStatus
histogram.summary: The status of the prediction model for an optimization target within the prediction manager. Recorded when the manager is asked if a navigation should be targeted and the decision for the navigation has not already been made.

histogram.name: OptimizationGuide.TargetDecision
histogram.summary: The decision made for whether the page load matches the optimization target.
